00046             function                update_category_title( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         $CategoryAlgorithms = get_package( 'category::category_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00052                         $CategoryAlgorithms->update_category_title( 
00053                               $Security->get_p( 'category_id' , 'integer' , 0 ) , $Security->get_p( 'title' , 'string' , '' )
00054                         );
00055                   }
00056                   catch( Exception $e )
00057                   {
00058                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00059                   }
00060             }

00080             function                category_list( $Options )
00081             {
00082                   try
00083                   {
00084                         $Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $MasterId = $Options->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00086                         $MasterType = $Options->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00087                         $Link->delete_link( $MasterId , false , $MasterType , 'category' );
00088                         
00089                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00090                         $Ids = $Security->get_global( '_id_' , 'integer' , CHECKBOX_IDS );
00091                         
00092                         $Link->create_link( $MasterId , $Ids , $MasterType , 'category' , true );
00093                   }
00094                   catch( Exception $e )
00095                   {
00096                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00097                   }
00098             }

00118             function                on_before_delete_category( $Parameters )
00119             {
00120                   try
00121                   {
00122                         /* allways called for the single category */
00123                         $cid = get_field( $Parameters , 'id' );
00124                         
00125                         $CategoryAccess = get_package( 'category::category_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00126                         
00127                         $Categories = $CategoryAccess->select_list( $cid );
00128 
00129                         $CategoryAccess->move_up_children_categories( $cid , get_field( $Categories[ 0 ] , 'root_id' ) );
00130                   }
00131                   catch( Exception $e )
00132                   {
00133                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00134                   }
00135             }
00136             
00155             function                controller( $Options )
00156             {
00157                   try
00158                   {
00159                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00160                         
00161                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_update_category_title' );
00162                         
00163                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_category_list' );
00164 
00165                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00166                   }
